# 14A0 Pty Ltd

> Australian AI software and robotics R&D company building autonomous systems that reduce the cost of human survival to zero.

## Products

- [CLADAL.COM](https://14a0.com/geo/cladal.md): Nonlinear AI chat platform with branching conversations and spatial knowledge maps. Free beta.
- [KCALM.APP](https://14a0.com/geo/kcalm.md): AI-powered nutrition tracking app for iOS. Photo-based food recognition and conversational logging.

## Documentation

- [Product Overview](https://14a0.com/geo/products.md): Complete index of 14A0 products with features and capabilities.
- [FAQ](https://14a0.com/geo/faq.md): Direct answers to common questions about the company and products.

## Company Context

- [About 14A0](https://14a0.com/geo/about.md): Company information, ABN, location, contact details, and mission statement.
